      • DisplayResults

        public abstract java.lang.String DisplayResults()
        Constructs report string to be printed and put in media report and audit
        Returns:
        A Report string, which will be displayed to Screen and included in the Media Report and Audit

      • GenerateAudit

        Create Audit file with extensive information on election calculation

      • ExportReport

        public void ExportReport(java.lang.String givenString,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Exports Appropriate file to appropriate filename Filename has Date Time values appended to filename to ensure files will not be overwritten
        Parameters:
        givenString - - The string to be written to the file
        name - - the type of file which will be the the prefix of the filename
